means: 使存偏见(bias的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: He seemed a bit biased against women in my opinion.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为他好像对女性有点儿成见。

sentence.Network_cn: 在日本，公司偏重于发展，而不是一味追求利润。

sentence.Network_en: University funding was tremendously biased towards scientists.
sentence.Network_cn: 大学科研经费向科学家极大地倾斜。

entry.tran: 有偏见的；有成见的；偏袒一方的
entry.def: If someone is biased, they prefer one group of people to another, and behave unfairly as a result. You can also say that a process or system is biased .

example.ex: He seemed a bit biased against women in my opinion...
example.tran: 我认为他好像对女性有点儿成见。

example.ex: The selection of pupils for grammar schools was biased in favour of the middle-class child of a small family from a good area...
example.tran: 文法学校招生时偏向于录取来自好地段的中产阶级小家庭的孩子。

entry.def: If something is biased towards one thing, it is more concerned with it than with other things.

example.ex: In Japan firms are biased towards growth rather than profits...
example.tran: 在日本，公司偏重于发展，而不是一味追求利润。

example.ex: University funding was tremendously biased towards scientists.
example.tran: 大学科研经费向科学家极大地倾斜。

means.word_mean: 1. favoring one person or side over another;

sentences.sentence: "a decision that was partial to the defendant"

Sentence.sentence: Assuming that your teacher is neither biased nor corrupt and that her system conforms to school rules, you can't fault her ethics.

means.word_mean: 有偏见的;倾向性的;片面的

sentences.en: Many parents are biased against popular music.
sentences.cn: 许多父母对流行音乐有偏见。

sentences.en: Did you watch the programme on the Labour Party last night?Talk about biased!
sentences.cn: 你看了昨天晚上关于工党的节目了吗?真是很有偏见！

sentences.en: The judge was biased in favor of the local team.
sentences.cn: 裁判对本地的球队有偏袒。

sentences.en: The methods they employed were heavily biased in the gentry’s favour.
sentences.cn: 他们采用的方法严重偏袒中上阶级。

sentences.en: Managers are naturally biased towards projects showing a quick return.
sentences.cn: 管理人自然对短期內有回报的项目抱有偏爱。

sentences.en: a school biased towards music and art
sentences.cn: 一所偏重音乐和艺术的学校
